fields.name: EncryptionAlgorithm
fields.description: Algorithm identifier for encryption, default RSA-OAEP.

fields.name: EncryptionAtHost
fields.description: Indicates whether or not resource disk encryption is enabled.

fields.name: KeyName
fields.description: Key name that is used for enabling disk encryption.

fields.name: KeyVersion
fields.description: Specific key version that is used for enabling disk encryption.

fields.name: MsiResourceId
fields.description: Resource ID of Managed Identity that is used to access the key vault.

fields.name: VaultUri
fields.description: Base key vault URI where the customers key is located eg. https://myvault.vault.azure.net
